Introduction

KJRGL is a six-member Japanese and South Korean boy group under Sony Music Entertainment Japan and Sony Music Entertainment Korea. They will release a pre-debut single on September 4, 2024, titled “Prologue ~ The Deepest Blue.” They will finally make their official debut on September 18, 2024, with the single “Overture ~ The Blue Wave.” They will debut first in Japan and then in South Korea.

The group's name is a combination of the Japanese words “GOLAE” and “KUJIRA,” which mean whale, and it stands for “Kind(of) Just Right Good Luck.”
